name: Shadow
description: The Shadow is the hidden half of a wraith, the version of her personality where the worst of her impulses and cruelty reside. No matter how vicious or kind she was in life, those dark aspects were present, a part of who she was.

name: Mortal Life
description: The wraith's mortal life, what they did before they died.

name: Death
description: The wraith's death, how they died.

name: Regret
description: The primary regret that a wraith has, usually their reason for still being around.
